tool_description: Creates comprehensive test environments by coordinating device setup, app installation, data seeding, and configuration validation for test execution.

environment_name.description: Unique name for the test environment

parallel_setup.description: Whether to setup devices in parallel

error_messages: Environment build failed: Unable to create complete test environment

usage: Provide environment_name and device_session_id to build a complete test environment, optionally specify app and data configurations.

environment_id.description: Unique identifier for the created environment

ready_devices.description: List of devices ready for testing

environment_url.description: Access URL for the test environment
